thread.section_title: Auto Lenders Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Auto Lenders | autolenders.com
thread.title: Eugene Aldrich
thread.title_full: Auto Lenders reviewed by Eugene Aldrich

author: Eugene Aldrich
title: Eugene Aldrich
text: With an incredible amount of cars to draw from, I could easily compare any differences in the models I was interested in. I was given all the time I needed to judge all the five I road tested. Which by the way only two were originally on the lot, the other three they happily transferred for me to try. I even came back a second day which was the amount of time I needed to make my decision. Next time your in Lakewood stop by and see Joel DeFreitas and find out what it's like to deal with a regular car guy who knows his product.
